text: Vaccins niet mij, persoonlijke vrijheid boven alles. Geen masker, geen lockdowns.  Translation:"Vaccines not for me, personal freedom above all. No masks, no lockdowns.  This post reflects the belief in individual freedom and a rejection of measures taken to prevent the spread of Covid-19, such as vaccines, masks, and lockdowns. The use of the hashtag  (freedom) and  (no lucky children) further emphasizes this stance.
